toggleGrid.label: Toggle Grid Labels
toggleGrid.hint: Toggles the Show Grid Labels setting

tooltip.label: Tooltip Hotkey
tooltip.hint: Tooltips are shown while the Tooltip Hotkey is pressed if Use Tooltip Hotkey is enabled

debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

showGrid.label: Show Grid Labels
showGrid.hint: Turn the grid labels on or off

gridFontSize.label: Grid Label Font Size
gridFontSize.hint: The size of the grid label text

gridScaleFontSize.label: Grid Label Scale with Zoom
gridScaleFontSize.hint: If enabled, the grid labels will stay the same size relative to the grid squares as you zoom in and out (just like tokens, drawings, etc). If disabled, the grid labels will stay a fixed size as you zoom in and out.

gridTextOutlineThickness.label: Grid Label Shadow Thickness
gridTextOutlineThickness.hint: The thickness of the of the shadows of the grid labels

gridTextColor.label: Grid Label Color
gridTextColor.hint: The color of the grid labels (supports all valid CSS colors)

gridTextOpacity.label: Grid Label Opacity
gridTextOpacity.hint: The opacity percentage of the grid labels (lower number = more transparent)

gridTextOutline.label: Grid Label Shadow Color
gridTextOutline.hint: The color of the shadows of the grid labels (supports all valid CSS colors)

gridTextVAlignment.label: Grid Label Vertical Alignment
gridTextVAlignment.hint: The vertical position of the grid labels inside each grid cell

gridTextHAlignment.label: Grid Label Horizontal Alignment
gridTextHAlignment.hint: The horizontal position of the grid labels inside each grid cell

showRulers.label: Show Rulers
showRulers.hint: Turn the rulers on or off (column labels above the board, row labels to the left of the board)

showRulerOverlay.label: Show Ruler Overlay
showRulerOverlay.hint: Turn the Ruler Overlay on or off (alternating black and white grid that shows over the board). Note: Show Rulers must be enabled for this setting to work.

rulerFontSize.label: Ruler Font Size
rulerFontSize.hint: The size of the ruler label text

rulerTextOddColor.label: Ruler Text Color, Odd
rulerTextOddColor.hint: The color of the ruler labels for odd rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerTextEvenColor.label: Ruler Text Color, Even
rulerTextEvenColor.hint: The color of the ruler labels for even rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerTextOutlineThickness.label: Ruler Text Shadow Thickness
rulerTextOutlineThickness.hint: The thickness of the shadows of the ruler labels

rulerTextOddOutline.label: Ruler Text Shadow Color, Odd
rulerTextOddOutline.hint: The color of the shadows of the ruler labels for odd rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerTextEvenOutline.label: Ruler Text Shadow Color, Even
rulerTextEvenOutline.hint: The color of the shadows of the ruler labels for even rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerTextOddOpacity.label: Ruler Text Opacity, Odd
rulerTextOddOpacity.hint: The opacity percentage of the ruler labels for odd rows and columns (lower number = more transparent)

rulerTextEvenOpacity.label: Ruler Text Opacity, Even
rulerTextEvenOpacity.hint: The opacity percentage of the ruler labels for even rows and columns (lower number = more transparent)

rulerOverlayOddColor.label: Ruler Overlay Color, Odd
rulerOverlayOddColor.hint: The color of the ruler overlay for odd rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerOverlayEvenColor.label: Ruler Overlay Color, Even
rulerOverlayEvenColor.hint: The color of the ruler overlay for even rows and columns (supports all valid CSS colors)

rulerOverlayOddOpacity.label: Ruler Overlay Opacity, Odd
rulerOverlayOddOpacity.hint: The opacity percentage of the ruler overlay for odd rows and columns (lower number = more transparent)

rulerOverlayEvenOpacity.label: Ruler Overlay Opacity, Even
rulerOverlayEvenOpacity.hint: The opacity percentage of the ruler overlay for even rows and columns (lower number = more transparent)

showTooltipsOnHotkey.label: Use Tooltip Hotkey
showTooltipsOnHotkey.hint: If enabled, tooltips will only show when the Tooltip Hotkey is pressed (hotkey must be configured in Controls). If disabled, tooltips will show even if the Tooltip Hotkey is not pressed.

tooltipPosition.label: Tooltip Position
tooltipPosition.hint: Position of the tooltip, relative to the cursor.

tooltipFontSize.label: Tooltip Font Size
tooltipFontSize.hint: The size of the tooltip text
